items.message:
River levels are forecast to rise at the Pillings Lock river gauge as a result of localised thunderstorms. Areas most at risk are low-lying agricultural land and roads including Slash Lane at Sileby and the Mountsorrel to Sileby road. 

Thunderstorms are forecast overnight tonight, 15/05/2022, and into tomorrow morning, 16/05/2022, with low confidence over exact timing and locations. We expect river levels to begin rising at around midnight tonight, with areas beginning to be affected from approximately 06:00 tomorrow morning. Levels are likely to remain high until tomorrow evening.

We are closely monitoring the situation. Please avoid using low-lying footpaths near local watercourses and plan driving routes to avoid low-lying roads near rivers, which may be flooded.  

This message will be updated by 09:00 on 16/05/2022, or as the situation changes.
